synopsis.text:
Determined to repay the debt he owes to the enigmatic silver-haired beauty who saved him, ordinary high school student Natsuki Subaru finds himself thrust into a world beyond his wildest dreams. With no special powers to speak of, Subaru's life takes a dramatic turn when he discovers his unique ability to reverse time upon death, allowing him to relive moments and alter the course of destiny.

As Subaru and the captivating girl face treacherous enemies and insurmountable challenges, they forge an unbreakable bond. But with each painful death, Subaru becomes increasingly isolated, as only he retains the memories of their shared experiences. Vowing to protect her and change their fate, Subaru resolves to shoulder the burden of his mysterious power.

In this gripping tale of love, sacrifice, and the power of memories, can Subaru harness his extraordinary gift to create a world where everyone can find happiness, even if it means enduring endless suffering and facing his own mortality time and time again? Join Subaru on his emotional journey as he uncovers the true strength within him and the depths of his unwavering devotion.
